You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesI I] > &iukcy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Iukcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0406/index.htm U+00406].
  * `&iukcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0456/index.htm U+00456].
